title: Cultists with correct guns
author: Dzierzan
description:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/smoothblood

This mod gives every cultist his correct weapon. So that means you'll see Ackolyte with actual TNT, Cultist with a shotgun, Fanatic with a tommy gun and finally Zealot with tesla gun.

Also included:

- actual gibbing animation for innocents,

- differrent sprites for cultist's electrocution,

- Stone Gargoygle having actual blue eyes when shooting,

- Blood Alpha Cultist's beast transformation animation
